original_text: They are to bring them to the priest, who shall first offer the one for the sin offering. He is to wring its head from its neck, not dividing it completely,
korean_text: 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요 제사장은 그 속죄제물을 먼저 드리되 그 머리를 목에서 비틀어 끊고 몸은 아주 쪼개지 말며

sentences.original_text: They are to bring them to the priest,
who shall first offer the one for the sin offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 먼저 그 중 하나를 속죄 제물로 바칠 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He is to wring its head from its neck,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것의 목에서 머리를 비틀어야 합니다.
